name: Eduflex
desc: A comprehensive learning management platform built using the MERN stack. Eduflex allows users to manage courses, track progress, and interact seamlessly.

name: ChronoChat
desc: A real-time chat application built using the MERN stack with Socket.IO for seamless messaging and group chats.

name: Food Delivery
desc: A full-stack food delivery web application built using the MERN stack. Features include browsing menus, placing orders,  for seamless food ordering.

name: FitClub
desc: A responsive fitness website designed to help users track workouts and explore fitness plans.

name: Ecomzy
desc: A simple shopping app that provides a seamless e-commerce experience, featuring product listings and cart functionalities.
